Module 6

Views and Visualization

In this module, you explore the tools available in the Autodesk® Revit® software to create several types of common project views and specify the information that appears in them.

You will be able to:

  • Create 2D views of their building model, such as plans, elevations, and sections—creating new views from scratch and duplicating existing views.

  • Create 3D views by duplicating and editing the default 3D orthographic view.

  • Customize the information presented in those views.

Exercise 1 Creating Plan Views

Exercise 2 Creating Elevation and Section Views

Exercise 3 Creating 3D Views

Exercise 4 Adjusting the Appearance of Elements in a View
